name: NertWorks All in One Social Share Tools
author: Nickolas Ormond and Allen Smith

sections.description:
NertWorks Social Share Tools make it easy for you to place social share, add, follow and like buttons through out your website. You can pick specific pages to make it show up with the [get_social_code] shortcode. Or you can use the options within the plugin settings to make it show where you’d like.

A brief Markdown

Ordered list:

1 Custom Icon Choices with a custom icon uploader
2 Supports Addthis Share Bar and Like Buttons
3 Supports Addtoany Share Bar and Like Buttons
4 Supports Addthis Floating Share Bar
5 Includes Meta Image Genie for Help with Facebook and Pinterest Meta Requirements
6 Include Shortcode Option
7 Now offers Instagram, Foursquare, Vimeo and many more under the Addthis section.
sections.installation:
1. Upload nertworks-social-share-tools to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Customize your buttons the way you want.
  4. Share your site til the cows come home.
sections.faq:
Is this an awesome plugin that will make it easy for me to place social share, follow and add buttons all over my website?

Yes, these things are true.

Which Star Wars Movie was your favorite?

Hmmmmm. A New Hope would have to be my final answer.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Custom Icon Choices with a custom icon uploader
  • Supports Addthis Share Bar and Like Buttons
  • Supports Addtoany Share Bar and Like Buttons
  • Supports Addthis Floating Share Bar
  • Includes Meta Image Genie for Help with Facebook and Pinterest Meta Requirements

1.01

  • Cleaner and Faster

1.05

  • Added Shortcode
  • Added Parser for Pages.

1.12

  • Supports Addthis Follow Buttons
  • Instagram, Pinterest and many many more.
